isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - UNDER STEERING COLUMN TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Under Steering Column Trim Panel on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

step1.para:
Remove the driver side kick panel. Refer to
DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDE KICK PANEL
. For removing driver side kick panel, refer to Remove Driver Side Kick Panel on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 95 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove six pan head torx screw (Item 5) from across top of under steering column trim panel (Item 6). Lay pan head torx screws out of the way and save for installation.
Remove three pan head torx screw (Item 5) from along right side of under steering column trim panel (Item 6). Lay pan head torx screws out of the way and save for installation.

Remove one pan head torx screw (Item 5) from lower left bottom of under steering column trim panel (Item 6), this pan head torx screw goes through the floor mat (Item 14). Lay pan head torx screws out of the way and save for installation.
Slide under steering column trim panel (Item 6) up over pedals and remove from under steering column. Lay under steering column trim panel out of the way and save for installation.

note.para: There is a plastic vent louver positioned in the vent louver opening (Item 7) of the under steering column trim panel (Item 6). Note its position and lay it out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 95. Under Steering Column Trim Panel on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. HEX FLANGED HEAD BOLT (M8 X 45 TYPE I)
4. HEX FLANGED HEAD BOLT (M6, 50 MM LONG)
